Title: The world's reactionary and degenerate headquarters, the United States, is a rotten imperialist country
Designer: Preparatory Committee of the East China Branch of the Chinese People's Committee to Preserve World Peace and to Oppose American Aggression (中国人民保卫世界和平反对美国侵略委员会华东总分会筹委会)
Publisher: Shanghai Shengsheng meishu gongsi (上海生生美术公司)
Notes: The Capitalist sits on a high-rise building symbolizing Wall Street, smoking a cigar and throwing down dollars. Below him, on the roof of the US Capitol: Mac Arthur, Acheson and Truman. On the left is a poster with a Mac Arthur caricature, recruiting soldiers for North Korea. On the foreground an African American is beaten with a whip, police arrests a peace demonstrator and a Ku Klux Klan member shoots a civilian. On the right a Western movie is filmed, and a young boy holds a copy of Life magazine with movie stars and dancing women on the cover.
